name: James Allis
summary: Dynamic Sales Leader with 20+ years of experience driving strategic business growth in real estate, hospitality, media, and advertising industries. Proven track record in new business development, creating innovative sales strategies, and leading high-performing teams. Successful in expanding market presence, increasing client base, and securing key accounts. Adept at building strong relationships with clients and stakeholders, with a visionary approach to sales excellence. Ready to leverage a blend of business acumen and sales expertise to lead a team toward achieving revenue targets and fostering customer satisfaction.

workExperienceArray.title: Director of Business Development
achievements: Director of Business Development
Hover Architecture
2023 - Present

Business Development Division Creation: Established and led the Business Development division to drive company growth, targeting specific industries and engaging with key stakeholders such as owners, developers, and design build firms.
Market Expansion: Diversified vertical markets by including sectors like Self-Storage and Veterinary/Pet Care.
Database Growth: Expanded the existing client database by 500%, broadening potential leads for future opportunities.
Increase in Prospects: Significantly increased prospects by 2350, showcasing the effectiveness of business development strategies.
Marketing Collaboration: Collaborated with an Ad Agency to create targeted marketing materials, such as e-mail campaigns and YouTube videos, to enhance brand visibility.
CRM Implementation: Established and managed a new CRM system, optimizing client data organization and streamlining communication processes.
New Account Prospecting: Utilized platforms like LinkedIn and Build Central to effectively prospect new accounts, enhancing lead generation efforts.
Leadership and Teamwork: Guided a team of business development professionals, providing strategic direction and fostering a collaborative work environment.

workExperienceArray.title: Account Executive / Business Development
achievements: Sales Expansion:  Generated business growth by identifying key opportunities and targeting new clientele in sectors like healthcare, infrastructure, construction, municipalities, government, and solar, resulting in acquiring large-scale contracts and successfully securing new partnerships.

Integrated Marketing Approach: Mobilized a comprehensive outreach strategy, blending email marketing with proactive phone calls, to engage prospective clients in the short-term housing market, leveraging Travelers Haven's nationwide partner network.

Team Collaboration: Collaborated effectively with cross-functional teams, utilizing Salesforce, Outreach, and ZoomInfo to identify and engage with over 200 potential customers, demonstrating strong teamwork and coordination skills.
